country.country_description: Marnon is a small planet located in the Alpha Centauri star system. It is home to many strange creatures and plants, some of which are only found on Marnon.
country.people_description: The inhabitants of Marnon are friendly, curious, and adventurous. They are a quiet, humble people with their own unique culture.
country.language_description: Marnonish is a unique language spoken by the inhabitants of Marnon. It is a combination of various elements from many different languages.

quenta.job_duties: Develop and maintain software applications, debug issues and improve software performance.
